meanings: (물건이) break, (산산조각 나다) smash, shatter, (금이 가다) crack

vlive.korean: 아 진짜 (핸드폰이) 깨져있었어요? Oh, it was really cracked? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) MONOGRAPH "FAN FEST 2019 SEVEN SECRETS" EP.06
[왜 깨지냐면 거울도 한이 미모 보고 놀라서] 왜 깨져요? [The mirror was surprised by HAN's look] Why? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 스키즈 천국에서 보낸 스파이야..? 그렇다면... 옥황상제님.. 땡큐 소머취...🖤 (Stray Kids talking about their tmi)
vlive.english: [The mirror was surprised by HAN's look] Why?

vlive.korean: 봐봐, 이미 깨져 보이지? Look, it's pixelated, right? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 🐰🐺 in AMSTERDAM🇳🇱
왜 다 깨져 보이는데? Why does the resolution look bad? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 강건너 민기구경(초특급 특별 게스트⭐️👑)
vlive.english: Why does the resolution look bad?

vlive.korean: 거울이 깨질 수 있잖아 - 거울... 왜 깨져요? The mirror could break. - The mirror...why would it break? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 오랜만에 연습실 브이라이브~?!? 😁
vlive.english: The mirror could break. - The mirror...why would it break?

examples.korean: ‘It’s broken,’ she wailed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “이게 깨져 버렸어.” 그녀가 큰소리로 투덜거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
